channel.title: Writing new strings to the login screen?
channel.description: Does anyone know how to add new strings to the login window? I mean like Silab had for a while which said "Loaded blah blah times." How do i do something like that?

item.title: Writing new strings to the login screen?
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:4, topic:201885”]http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/awt/Graphics.html#drawString(java.lang.String,%20int,%20int)
Is a dirtier way to do it as the client already contains a method that will draw to the loading screen. You can do it the dirty way, or figure out what the actual method is in each update and then inject your own reference to it.

[quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=266537.msg2207921#msg2207921 date=1209735558]
In the client class, search for “drawLoadingText(int i, String s)”.
[/quote]The “loaded bla bla times” he was reffering to is not part of the loading bar.

P.S. I’m assuming you’re talking about clients with version numbers higher than 317. Otherwise, I suggest posting this in the client hacking section of http://moparisthebest.com/smf/[/quote]
Thanks TeleNubby!

Read full topic
item.source: Writing new strings to the login screen?

item.title: Writing new strings to the login screen?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/awt/Graphics.html#drawString(java.lang.String,%20int,%20int)
Is a dirtier way to do it as the client already contains a method that will draw to the loading screen. You can do it the dirty way, or figure out what the actual method is in each update and then inject your own reference to it.

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:3, topic:201885”]In the client class, search for “drawLoadingText(int i, String s)”.[/quote]The “loaded bla bla times” he was reffering to is not part of the loading bar.

P.S. I’m assuming you’re talking about clients with version numbers higher than 317. Otherwise, I suggest posting this in the client hacking section of http://moparisthebest.com/smf/

Read full topic
